evs.metric.metrics
Class ScoreMetric

java.lang.Object
  evs.metric.metrics.Metric
      evs.metric.metrics.ScoreMetric
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrierScore, MeanContRankProbScore, ROCScore
public abstract class ScoreMetric
extends Metric

An abstract base class for metrics that represents an integrated score. Integrated scores are derived from a set of raw verification data and include, the Brier score, the Ranked Probability Score and the Continuous Ranked Probability Score.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

Method Detail

getResult

public DoubleResult getResult(int forecastType,
                              int decomposedType)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Return a result for the specified forecast type and type of decomposed result or null. Throws an exception if the forecast type or decomposed type are unrecognized. See this class for the types of decomposition allowed.

Parameters:
forecastType - the type of result required (see the ForecastTypeParameter class)
decomposedType - the decomposition indicator
Returns:
the metric result or null
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

hasResult

public boolean hasResult(int forecastType,
                         int decomposedType)
Returns true if the metric has a decomposed result for the specified forecast type and type of decomposition. See this class for the types of decomposition allowed.

Parameters:
forecastType - the forecast type
decomposedType - the component of the decomposition
Returns:
true if the result exists, false otherwise

getDecompose

public boolean getDecompose()
Returns true if the score will be decomposed for each forecast type, false otherwise.

Returns:
true if the score will be decomposed

canDecompose

public boolean canDecompose()
Returns true if a score decomposition is supported, false otherwise.

Returns:
true if decomposition is supported

deepCopyResults

Overrides superclass method to deep copy the decomposed results also.

deepCopyResults in class Metric
Parameters:
metric - the input metric that will receive the deep copied results
